channel.title: !HELP! Char Names! Weird Letter! !HELP!
channel.description:
[b]ok so i have done this tutorial which was cheat client protection which i would need a certain client to connect to my server and i dont know why after that it started creating character files with a: È at the start then the name of the character. My Commands are not working properly for example: ::xteleto (Name) etc...[/b] I need support and help from coders to fix this i really need this fix real fast because im hosting a server and i dont want to remove cheat client protection which will cause me alot of incidents eg.. long usernames and so on its really hard to ip ban them.
SO PLEASE ANYONE IF YOU CAN HELP I REALLY APPRECIATE IT!
[b]HERE ARE SOME PICTURES!![/b]
[img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/25/pic1em.jpg[/img] [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/1355/pic3or.png[/img] [img]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/996/pic2f.png[/img]

ok so i have done this tutorial which was cheat client protection which i would need a certain client to connect to my server and i dont know why after that it started creating character files with a: È at the start then the name of the character. My Commands are not working properly for example:
::xteleto (Name) etc…
I need support and help from coders to fix this i really need this fix real fast because im hosting a server and i dont want to remove cheat client protection which will cause me alot of incidents eg… long usernames and so on its really hard to ip ban them.
